summary: Completed testing of timeline page project filter duplication fix and Gantt chart task display. Backend APIs are fully functional, but frontend has authentication state management issues preventing full timeline UI rendering.

ui_bugs.issue: Timeline page gets stuck on 'Loading projects...' state despite successful API calls
ui_bugs.impact: Prevents timeline UI from fully rendering and blocks testing of project selector functionality

integration_issues.issue: ProjectFilterContext fails to fetch projects due to authentication token issues
integration_issues.symptoms: Console errors: 'Error fetching projects: TypeError: Failed to fetch' for /api/projects and /api/health endpoints

passed_tests: Timeline Gantt API (successfully returns 5 tasks and 3 dependencies for proj-ed3228210c23)
Timeline API Response Structure (correct project_id, tasks array, dependencies array)
Sidebar Navigation (Timeline link accessible and clickable)
Timeline API Integration (console logs show successful data fetching)
No Duplicate Project Filters (no duplicate selectors detected in current state)

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (authentication and routing work, but timeline UI blocked by loading issues)

action_item_for_E1: CRITICAL: Fix ProjectFilterContext authentication token management. The timeline-specific API works perfectly, but the general project fetching in ProjectFilterContext fails with 'Failed to fetch' errors, preventing the timeline UI from fully rendering. This blocks testing of project selector functionality and Gantt chart visibility.

backend_api_performance.authentication: ✅ Working perfectly - JWT tokens generated correctly
backend_api_performance.health_endpoint: ✅ Returns healthy status with proper service info
backend_api_performance.projects_endpoint: ✅ Returns sample project 'proj-ed3228210c23' with correct structure
backend_api_performance.timeline_gantt_endpoint: ✅ Returns 5 tasks and 3 dependencies as expected for proj-ed3228210c23

frontend_authentication_flow.timeline_navigation: ✅ Timeline link in sidebar is accessible

timeline_specific_testing.api_integration: ✅ Timeline API calls successful (confirmed in console logs)
timeline_specific_testing.project_selection: ❌ Cannot test - UI stuck in loading state
timeline_specific_testing.gantt_chart_visibility: ❌ Cannot verify - timeline UI not fully rendered
timeline_specific_testing.enhanced_view_toggle: ❌ Cannot test - UI elements not rendered
